Name: Steel Sword
Description: Deal [sword]<d6> damage.|If limit break is charged[;]|deal an additional [sword]2.
Script: On Execute: if(self.limitvalue >= self.limitmax) { attack(d + 2); sfxdamage(target[;] d + 2); } else { attack(d); sfxdamage(target[;] d); }

Name: Combat Nudge
Description: Dice value -1. On a 1|give a 6 instead.|

Name: Steel Sword_upgraded
Description: Deal [sword]<d6> damage.|If limit break is charged[;]|deal an additional [sword]2.
Script: On Execute: if(self.limitvalue >= self.limitmax) { attack(d + 2); sfxdamage(target[;] d + 2); } else { attack(d); sfxdamage(target[;] d); }

Name: Pea Gun
Description: Do [sword]<var:gun> damage[;] increases|each use[;] resets each turn|[gray](Reuseable)

Description: Do [sword]<var:gun> damage[;] increases|each use[;] resets each turn|[gray](Reuseable)

Name: Pea Gun_downgraded
Description: Do [sword]<var:pea> damage[;] increases|each use[;] resets each turn|[gray](Reuseable)

Name: Energy Gun
Script: On Execute: if(self.getvar(star) == 0) { attack(d + 2[;] STAR); self.setvar(star[;] 1); } else { attack(d[;] STAR); }

Name: Energy Gun_upgraded
Script: On Execute: if(self.getvar(star) == 0) { attack(d + 2[;] star); self.setvar(star[;] 1); } else { attack(d[;] star); }

Name: M0nk1 Wr3nch
Script: On Execute: var monki = d * 2; if(monki >= 7) { if(monki >= 12) { givedice(6); givedice(6); } else { var wrench = rand([1[;]2[;]3[;]4[;]5[;]6]); var wrunch = monki - wrench; givedice(wrench); givedice(wrunch); } } else { var wrench = split(monki); givedice(wrench); }

Name: M0nk1 Wr3nch_upgraded
Script: On Execute: var monki = d * 2; if(monki >= 7) { if(monki >= 12) { givedice(6); givedice(6); } else { var wrench = rand([1[;]2[;]3[;]4[;]5[;]6]); var wrunch = monki - wrench; givedice(wrench); givedice(wrunch); } } else { var wrench = split(monki); givedice(wrench); }

Name: H4mm3r
Script: On Execute: if(d == 8) { inflict(SHOCK); attack(d[;] SHOCK); } else if(getstatus(SHOCK) >= 1) { attack(d[;] SHOCK); } else { attack(d[;] SHOCK); }

Name: H4mm3r_upgraded
Script: On Execute: if(d == 8) { inflict(SHOCK); attack(d[;] SHOCK); } else if(getstatus(SHOCK) >= 1) { attack(d[;] SHOCK); } else { attack(d/2[;] SHOCK); }

Name: Cl0p1ck
Description: Split die[;] on 1 undo your turn
Script: On Execute: if(d == 1)  undoturn(); inflictself(EXTRATURN); self.endturnnow(); } else { givedice(split(d)[;] ~splitdice~); }

Name: Cl0p1ck_upgraded
Description: Split die[;]|On 1 undo your turn[;]|and heal [heal]4 HP
Script: On Execute: if(d == 1)  undoturn(); inflictself(EXTRATURN); self.endturnnow(); attackself(-4); } else { givedice(split(d)[;] ~splitdice~); }

Name: UwU_upgraded
Description: Heal for [heal]16 Hp|Heal the enemy for [heal]10 Hp

Name: UwU_downgraded
Description: Heal for [heal]10 Hp|Heal the enemy for [heal]16 Hp

Name: Stage Fright
Script: On Execute: jinx(~Stage Fright~[;]~Haunt some dice~[;]~Haunt some dice~[;]~inflict(HAUNT[;]d); sfx(\~_curse\~[;]\~\~[;]0.2);~[;]self[;]self[;]1[;]1); sfx(~_thinghappens~);
